description.originalText: My name is Tamar. I am a registered diagnostic medical sonographer and I’ve been working at hospital more than eight years. It’s my pleasure to write review for Nino. She is a special person.She is  very well known in Georgian community for her kindness and compassion. Nino has been my best friend since childhood. We both came to America 25 years ago when we were very young. We faced many tough times together and always helped each other. I also worked in eldercare for a long time, Nino and I have worked together many times as caregivers, and we made a great team. She's always adept at handling tough situations, and both the elderly and their families adore her. She is a very trustworthy and honest person; you can rely on her for help or support whenever needed. Additionally, Nino is an excellent cook, and I love her food. I highly recommend her to anyone in need of a caregiver for their loved ones.

I highly recommend Nino (Nina) for the caregiving position. Her exceptional character, dedication, and skills were evident when she assisted my family during the challenging time. Nino provided invaluable support , brought joy with her warmth and humor, and her culinary talents are exceptional.
Hiring Nino would be a decision you won’t regret.

Nina has been an exceptional caregiver for my mom for nearly a year, providing invaluable support during a challenging time when my mother's health was poor and she required daily assistance. We found Nina through a website, and upon learning of her previous experience working with my mom's neighbor's husband in the same building, we were thrilled. The glowing recommendation from the neighbor further solidified our decision to hire Nina.
With Ninas great care, my mom has regained her strength and independence, now able to live on her own again. We are immensely grateful for Nina's help, and if my mom ever needs assistance in the future, we would not hesitate to reach out to Nina first. We highly recommend her to any family in need of a caregiver.

Nina has been such an amazing caregiver for my mom for almost a year. During that time, my mother’s health condition was very poor, and she needed daily assistance. My sister-in-law found Nina through this website. When she spoke with Nina, she discovered that Nina had previously worked with my mom’s neighbor's husband in the same building . We were thrilled about this connection. Mom’s neighbor described Nina’s personality beautifully, and we hired her right away.

A year later, my mom improved and regained her strength. She was able to live on her own again. My mother is still alive and doing well. If she needs assistance in the future, we’ll definitely reach out to Nina first and hire her again if she's available. Our entire family is deeply grateful for Nina’s help, and we highly recommend her to any family in need of a caregiver.

Recommendation for Nina M. 

I wanted to take a moment to thank you for providing us with Nina. As you are aware, she has been the primary care-giver and companion for my elderly cousin for the past year. During that time, we found that Nina was not only exceptionally reliable but she was responsible for doing the grocery shopping, preparing meals and doing the light-cleaning which was necessary to enhance my cousin's quality of life. Nina's compassion and understanding went a long way towards providing the stability necessary in my cousin's sometimes confused life.
Although we now find ourselves in a position where we need to relocate my cousin to a more structured facility, had the circumstances been different we would certainly have kept our arrangement with Nina. Unfortunately, at this time, we need to move her closer to us in New Jersey and it would not be practical for her to remain in the Manhattan.
In closing, I just want to reaffirm our unqualified support of Nina and her efforts with your firm.
She is truly an asset and a wonderful representative of what quality, supportive and affectionate care is supposed to be.

Sincerely,
P.J.

When my mother needed constant care, we opted to keep her at home for comfort and closeness. We were fortunate to have Nino care for her from November 1, 2005, until her passing in June of 2007, and I highly recommend her services. Although it was a while ago, we still maintain a good relationship with Nina, staying in touch sometimes.

During this period, Nino not only attended to my mother's physical needs but also managed household chores, prepared meals, and ensured Mom remained mentally and physically active. Her professionalism and round-the-clock availability allowed us to enjoy our time with Mom without constant worry.

Despite the challenging decision between home care and institutionalization, Nino's compassionate care affirmed that keeping Mom at home was the right choice. Nino also formed a close bond with my Aunt, further cementing her place in our family.

To whom it may concern,

In 2008, Nina provided round-the-clock care for my mother following a stroke and subsequent acute TIAs. Initially mobile, my mother's condition deteriorated, necessitating full-time bed care. Nina attended to her every need, including feeding and ensuring her comfort during acute episodes. Despite the challenges, she managed household tasks, prepared nutritious meals, and earned praise from medical professionals for her exceptional care. I believe my mother's extended life was largely due to Nina's dedication, making her a trusted member of our family.

It was a long time ago, but we will always remember Nina's kindness.

Nino worked with my mother from September 2018 until April 2019 in Manhattan on the upper east side. Initially, my mother was suffering from severe depressio, making it challenging for her to manage daily tasks. Nina assisted with shopping, cooking, and organizing my mother's home. Additionally, my mother had three cancerous growths on her leg that required care from Nina. As my mother's physical and mental health improved, we gradually reduced Nina's hours and eventually decided to let her go as my mother was managing well on her own.
Nina is an excellent shopper and a passionate cook, ensuring my mother ate well during her time with us. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
For further inquiries, please contact me via Nina.

To whom it may concern,
